Form.Control.name: --form-control-gap
Form.Control.description: Controls the spacing gap between child elements, e.g. icons.

Form.Label.name: --form-label-gap
Form.Label.description: Controls the spacing gap between child elements, e.g. icons.

Form.Group.name: change
Form.Group.description: Fires whenever the logic_state has its value changed via the Svelte Context.

Form.Control.name: logic_id
Form.Control.description: Sets the form id attribute in a Svelte Context for child Form Components to target / assign as.

Form.Control.name: logic_name
Form.Control.description: Sets the form name attribute in a Svelte Context for child Form Components to group as.

Form.Group.name: logic_name
Form.Group.description: Sets the form name attribute in a Svelte Context for child Form Components to group as.

Form.Group.name: logic_id
Form.Group.description: Sets the form id attribute in a Svelte Context for child Form Components to target / assign as.

Form.Group.name: logic_state
Form.Group.description: Controls the currently active Form Component via a Svelte Context.

Form.Label.name: for
Form.Label.description: Sets the for attribute of the element that is targetted.
